alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 3:42AM AKST until December 04 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Power outages are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
